source_caption_data.pre_caption: This point-of-view video captures a street corner, likely on a university campus, during twilight. The camera pans from a sidewalk view to a wider shot of an intersection. The scene includes a crosswalk, streetlights, trees, and buildings, with a few cars passing by.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This point-of-view video captures a street corner, likely on a university campus, during twilight. The camera pans from a sidewalk view to a wider shot of an intersection. The scene includes a crosswalk, streetlights, trees, and buildings, with a few cars passing by.

generated_critique:
The feedback is:
While the caption correctly identifies the point-of-view perspective and twilight setting, it significantly underdescribes the motion of the subjects and relies on speculation. The description of "a few cars passing by" is too generic; it should specify their actions, such as one car slowing to a stop as a traffic light changes to red while another car turns right through the intersection. The caption completely omits any human subjects, which are central to a campus scene. For instance, it fails to mention a student who skateboards across the crosswalk синхронно with the "Walk" signal, or a small group of people walking along the opposite sidewalk. Furthermore, the phrase "likely on a university campus" is speculative; if a building with university-style architecture or a sign is visible, this should be stated Tatsache. The description of the camera's movement could also be more precise, detailing if it first lifts upward from a view of the pavement before panning left to reveal the full intersection, thus providing a more accurate chronological account of the shot.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This point-of-view video captures a bustling street corner on a university campus during twilight. The camera initially lifts upward from a view of the pavement before panning left to reveal the full intersection. The scene includes a crosswalk, streetlights, trees, and university-style buildings. A car slows to a stop as the traffic light changes to red, while another car turns right through the intersection. A student skateboards across the crosswalk in sync with the "Walk" signal, and a small group of people walks along the opposite sidewalk.
